importantArticles.headline: Chinese autonomous driving company Pony AI Inc (NASDAQ:PONY) on Friday shared plans to develop autonomous driving technology in partnership with Tencent Holding (OTC:TCEHY) Tencent Cloud and deploy robotaxi services on Tencent’s WeChat and other applications. The deal will include cooperation in cloud services, map data, information security, and intelligent cockpit ecosystems, CNBC reported Friday, citing the company press release. The companies will also integrate Pony.ai’s robotaxi ride-haili
importantArticles.title: Pony.ai And Tencent Partner On L4 Robotaxis, Expand China's Self-Driving Future

importantArticles.headline: As part of today's Market Minute, Brad Smith outlines the top stories on Wall Street in just 60 seconds. Internet stocks, including AppLovin (APP), Pinterest (PINS), and Reddit (RDDT), are gaining after Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL) earnings showed ad revenue strength. T-Mobile (TMUS) stock plunges on the company's weak new subscriber count. Pony AI (PONY) partners with Tencent (TCEHY) on robotaxis. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
importantArticles.title: Google ad strength, T-Mobile falls, Pony AI & Tencent partnership

importantArticles.headline: Brad Smith and Madison Mills take a closer look at some of today's trending tickers. Pony AI (PONY) and Tencent (TCEHY) announce a partnership on robotaxis. Alphabet-owned (GOOG, GOOGL) Waymo reported more than 250,000 paid rides a week. Meta Platforms (META) cut jobs in its Reality Labs division. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.
importantArticles.title: Tencent & Pony AI, Waymo, Meta job cuts: Trending Tickers

importantArticles.headline: Since last Friday, shares of Pony AI (NASDAQ: PONY), a China-based autonomous vehicle company, have blasted over 70% higher, as of 1:38 p.m. ET Thursday.  The company recently rolled out its seventh-generation autonomous driving system at the auto show in Shanghai.  Investors are clearly impressed by Pony AI's robotaxis, which are backed by Toyota.
importantArticles.title: Why Shares of Pony AI Blasted 70% Higher This Week

importantArticles.headline: WeRide (NASDAQ: WRD) stock got crushed Wednesday despite a bullish day of trading for the broader market.  While the Nasdaq Composite index gained 2.5% in the session, the autonomous driving specialist's share price closed out the day down 17%.  The big sell-off for WeRide stock appears to have been spurred by Pony AI revealing its robotaxi lineup at the Shanghai International Automobile Industry Exhibition today.
importantArticles.title: Why WeRide Stock Plummeted Today

importantArticles.headline: Unless you have a very fast horse, it probably won't pay to chase Pony stock.

importantArticles.headline: Pony.ai Europe, the European division of global autonomous driving leader Pony.ai (NASDAQ: PONY), has obtained a scientific testing permit for Level 4 autonomous driving from Luxembourg's Ministry of Mobility and Public Works, the company announced today. This authorization expands Pony.ai's global testing portfolio, building on existing permits in China, the United States, and South Korea.
importantArticles.title: Pony.ai Europe Secures Luxembourg Robotaxi Testing Permit

importantArticles.headline: NEW YORK, April 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Pony AI Inc. (“Pony.ai” or the “Company”) (Nasdaq: PONY), a global leader in achieving large-scale commercialization of autonomous mobility, today announced it has received a permit from Luxembourg’s Ministry of Mobility and Public Works to begin Level 4 (L4) Robotaxi testing. This pivotal milestone comes as Pony.ai establishes its first dedicated European research and testing hub in Luxembourg, making it the first autonomous vehicle company to do so.
importantArticles.title: PONY AI Inc. Receives Luxembourg’s Autonomous Vehicle of Robotaxi Testing Permit, Establishes Its First European Hub for Research and Testing

importantArticles.headline: SHENZHEN, China, March 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Pony AI Inc. (“Pony.ai” or the “Company”) (Nasdaq: PONY), a global leader in achieving large-scale commercialization of autonomous mobility, today announced that it has received the license to provide fully driverless commercial Robotaxi services in Shenzhen’s Nanshan District. This milestone follows the successful launch of its paid robotaxi services in the neighboring Bao’an District. Pony.ai is the first and only company to receive approval
importantArticles.title: Pony AI Inc. Expands Fully Driverless Commercial Robotaxi Services in Shenzhen Nanshan District, Accelerating the Commercialization of Autonomous Mobility for Everyday Travel
